replies.body: I'm torn. I see the merits in both systems. League feels like a better long-term accomplishment, but OW feels like more short-term gratification.
There are times in overwatch that ur just a few points from a  new rank. The seasons in overwatch are way too short. Apart from that they are similar rank systems just league's is better
